body: Due To all of the problems I am Finaly leaving Avicus... i will come back one day.. i have school holidays now ....but....*sniff* I remember all the good moments in old and new avicus..... *Sniff* *Tears* Oh my ..... goodBye Gargoyle Sighning Out!
